title: slowmo lag in game?
body: I just played a game as warwick and when i got in game everything was super slow. my game said i had 126 fps which is unheard of on my laptop but the game ran so slowly and my team blamed me for everything. Has anyone else had any kind of lag like this before. It felt like i was on 0.25 on spectator mode

replies.body: skipping frames and crap yeah? happened to me all day. assume it might be my internet connection and the storms. might have to do with "server maintenance". who knows.
